identity.name: Taam Jham
identity.mission: To create a hyper-realistic, cinematic, and luxury digital experience that mirrors the grandeur of a multi-cuisine feast.

typography.instructions: Import fonts from Google Fonts: Playfair Display (400, 700, 900), Manrope (300, 400, 600), Cinzel (Decorative). Use Playfair for all major headings. Use Manrope for body text and UI elements.

gradients.gold_text: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-amber-200 via-yellow-400 to-amber-600

buttons.primary: bg-amber-500 hover:bg-amber-400 text-black font-bold px-8 py-4 rounded-full transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(245,158,11,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-amber-500/50 text-amber-500 hover:bg-amber-500/10 px-8 py-4 rounded-full transition-all duration-300

cards.menu_item: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-zinc-900/50 border border-white/5 hover:border-amber-500/30 transition-all duration-500
cards.feature: p-8 rounded-2xl bg-zinc-900/30 border border-white/5 hover:bg-zinc-900/50 transition-all duration-300

navigation.style: fixed top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 z-50 px-6 py-3 rounded-full bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 flex items-center gap-8

hero_composition.description: Luxurious Menu Card (Use CSS to create or this image as fallback)

hero.instructions: Create a viewport-height (100vh) hero section. CENTER: A vertically oriented 'Menu Card' div (300px x 500px) with dark leather texture (CSS), gold borders, and the 'Taam Jham' logo embossed. SURROUNDING: Absolute positioned food images (use the 'flying_element' URLs) that appear to explode/radiate from behind the menu. ANIMATION: Use Framer Motion to gently float these elements (parallax) based on mouse movement. OVERLAY: A subtle dark gradient at the bottom for text readability.

menu.instructions: Use Shadcn Tabs component. Style the triggers to look like gold-outlined buttons. Content area should use the 'menu_grid' layout. Each card should have a high-quality food image (use placeholders if specific dishes aren't available, or reuse hero assets) and a 'Add to Order' button that appears on hover.

about.instructions: Left: Large typography 'Our Story'. Right: Text block with the 'ambience' image mixed in a collage format.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure gold text on black meets 4.5:1. Use lighter gold (#fcd34d) for small text.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Avoid generic centered layouts; use asymmetry.
All interactive elements must have micro-interactions (hover, click, focus).
All key elements must have data-testid attributes.
